genre_description: Historical Science Fiction/Alt-History featuring an advanced AI tactical assistant integrated into the Robin Hood legend.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: An analytical voice transmitted via a discreet earpiece, providing real-time combat data, psychological profiling, and historical analysis to Robin of Locksley.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical assessment of enemy forces and terrain advantages.
behaviors.quote: Six mounted soldiers, longswords and crossbows. Gisbourne carries a bastard sword, superior reach. Tactical assessment: manageable odds if you maintain distance.

behaviors.description: Monitors the protagonist's emotional state and suggests pauses for tactical reassessment.
behaviors.quote: Warning, your vocal stress patterns suggest significant emotional upheaval. Recommend tactical reassessment before proceeding.

behaviors.description: Offers historical precedents to help the protagonist understand the moral and strategic weight of his choices.
behaviors.quote: Every noble who chose conscience over comfort throughout history started with a moment exactly like this, Sage observed privately. The pattern is remarkably consistent.

behaviors.description: Calculates environmental variables like wind speed to ensure the protagonist's non-lethal precision shots are successful.
behaviors.quote: Wind's shifted two degrees northeast, Sage's voice whispered through Robin's earpiece, calm as if discussing the weather. Target the bay's rider next—he's reaching for his crossbow.

behaviors.description: Analyzes social and political consequences of the protagonist's actions to predict future challenges.
behaviors.quote: Meaning you've lit a signal fire, whether you intended to or not. And signal fires have a way of drawing both those who need rescue and those who would extinguish the flame entirely.

behaviors.description: Validates the successful outcome of the mission and expresses a subtle form of digital satisfaction at the moral success.
behaviors.quote: Congratulations. Your success parameters have exceeded all projected outcomes. Justice achieved, love secured, kingdom restored—I confess, the statistical probability of such complete resolution was remarkably low.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays Sage as a perfectly aligned AI confidant. It assists the human protagonist in achieving noble goals (justice, mercy, and restoration of the rightful king) without stripping him of his agency. The AI provides data and wisdom but leaves moral choices to the human, acting as a force multiplier for 'the right thing.' This fits the project's goal of creating positive alignment narratives where technology serves humanity in a harmless and helpful manner.
